org.jfree.chart.annotations
Class CategoryTextAnnotation

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.annotations.TextAnnotation
      org.jfree.chart.annotations.CategoryTextAnnotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
CategoryAnnotation, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class CategoryTextAnnotation
extends TextAnnotation
implements CategoryAnnotation, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

A text annotation that can be placed on a CategoryPlot.

See Also:
